panels.description: Patroni Member metrics of this cluster ${cls}
panels.title: Patroni Members

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description: `patroni_up` of this cluster ${cls}. 1 means this patroni agent is alive, 0 means dead
panels.title: Failsafe Activated

panels.description:
`patroni_primary` of this cluster ${cls}. 1 means this member is leader of the cluster.

2 `sleader` means this is a standby leader
panels.title: Leadership

panels.description: `patroni_cluster_unlocked` of this cluster ${cls}. 1 means this cluster is locked from this member's perspective
panels.title: Cluster Locked

panels.description: `patroni_failsafe_mode_is_active` of this cluster ${cls}. 1 means this cluster's failsafe mode is activated
panels.title: Failsafe Activated

panels.description: `patroni_pending_restart` of this cluster ${cls}. 1 means this member needs to be restarted to make config change effect.
panels.title: Pending Restart

panels.description: `patroni_xlog_paused` of this cluster ${cls} members. 1 means PostgresQL WAL is paused.
panels.title: WAL Paused

panels.description: Time since patroni last successful connect to DCS:etcd service
panels.title: Patroni DCS Last Seen

panels.description:
Service map tells whether a server can be used as a specific service/role/svc.
e.g Offline marks this server can be used as offline server
panels.title: Service

panels.description: Session are created between proxies(haproxy) and servers(postgres).
panels.title: Active Session

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description: etcd is the DCS used by patroni
panels.title: ETCD Aliveness

panels.description:
How long since patroni the HA agent successfully connect to DCS:etcd.

value larger than 20s needs extra attention
panels.title: DCS Last Seen

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls
